string-array.name: terms_conditions
string-array.item: 1. My participation in this competition held by stories of common man is voluntary .
2. I understand that Storiesofcommonman.in reserves all the rights over the material submitted for the competition.
3. I understand that the money once paid would not be refunded at any cost
4. Every thing submitted for the competition is completely legit and free from all legal obligations

string-array.name: rules_regulations
string-array.item: ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠1. No plagiarism will be entertained , if found your entry would be disqualified for the competition
2. Your name on the certificate would be the same as that of the one you applied with, no changes will be made
⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠3. For tech support or app crash please consult your campus ambassador immediately
4. For all queries you can contact ur campus ambassador and we are available on writetous@storiesofcommonman.in
5. All decisions made by storiesofcommonman.in are final and the winners would be announced later .
